column2: 12. A driver approaching a flashing red traffic signal must:

column2: 13. Are drivers allowed to exceed the speed limit to pass other vehicles?
column4: Yes, except for school zones.

column2: 14. Two vehicles from different directions arrive at the same time at an intersection with no traffic signs or signals. Which vehicle has the right of way?
column4: The vehicle on the left.

column8: The vehicle that enters the intersection first.

column2: 15. At a stop sign there is no stop line or crosswalk. You must stop:

column10: after you enter the intersection, if you have a clear view of traffic on the intersecting roadway.

column2: 16. When the pavement is marked with a double yellow line, drivers may pass other vehicles:

column10: None of the other answers is correct.
